description: Structured information about the launch of a computational process.
label: Launch configuration
name: LaunchConfiguration

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/argum._instruction: Enter all command line arguments for this launch configuration.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/argum.label: Argument
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/argum.name: argument

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr._instruction: Enter a short text describing this launch configuration.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.description: Longer statement or account giving the characteristics of someone or something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.label: Description
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.name: description

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/envir._instruction: Add any environment variables defined by this launch configuration.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/envir.label: Environment variable
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/envir.name: environmentVariable

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/execu._instruction: Enter the path to the command-line executable.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/execu.label: Executable
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/execu.name: executable

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this launch configuration.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.label: Name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.name: name
